name: Movie Tracker TMDB
description: A web app for searching, tracking and rating movies and TV Shows

features.title: Discovery, filters and sorting
features.content: You can filter media by release year, average TMDB rating, genre, language, streaming service or keywords and sort by TMDB rating, vote count or popularity

features.title: Reviews
features.content: Rate media on a 10-point scale with optional written reviews

features.title: Watchlists
features.content: A list that removes media after you log or review it

features.title: Stats
features.content: Charts and lists with different stats about the user's ratings and viewing habits

name: Open Chat
description: LLM chat client with a responsive interface and local data storage

features.title: Local data
features.content: Chats are saved locally in IndexedDB

features.title: Markdown Rendering
features.content: Code blocks with syntax highlighting, tables, math formulas

features.title: Model Selection
features.content: Choose from any model available on OpenRouter, mark your favorites, and set a default model

features.title: Chat Branching
features.content: Create chat branches from any message so you can explore different conversation paths
